summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Solid Waste Utility; authorizing the preparation of an environmental impact statement for the Comprehensive Solid Waste Management Study Volume I: Operating and Planning Programs and Volume II: Policy and Development Plan; authorizing the Mayor to execute an agreement for financial assistance with the Washington Department of Ecology; authorizing the retention of consultants; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1985 budget; and making appropriations therefor.
